original_title: A Dream of Armageddon - New National Theatre Tokyo
overview: H.G. Wells's story traces the experiences of a man, ravaged by dreams in which he serves as the proverbial frog in the pot of water: in a dystopian dream-world where a military dictatorship threatens to take absolute power the protagonist, formerly a powerful politician in this dream, chooses to do nothing.
title: A Dream of Armageddon - New National Theatre Tokyo
